mapper.select: select r.isbn as isbn, r.title as title, r.author as author, r.img as img, avg_star as star from read_book as r join (select isbn, truncate(avg(star),1)avg_star from library group by isbn) as l on l.isbn=r.isbn order by avg_star desc limit 20

select r.*, l.user_count, s.avg_star as star from read_book as r join (select isbn, count(user_id) as user_count from library group by isbn) as l on r.isbn=l.isbn join (select isbn, truncate(avg(star),1) as avg_star from library group by isbn) as s on r.isbn=s.isbn order by l.user_count desc limit 20
select r.title, r.author, r.publisher, l.*, l.isbn library_isbn from read_book as r join library as l on l.isbn=r.isbn AND user_id=#{user_id} order by l.library_no
select r.title, r.author, r.publisher, l.*, l.isbn library_isbn from read_book as r join library as l on l.isbn=r.isbn AND l.user_id=#{user_id} AND l.library_no=#{library_no}
SELECT l.isbn, ifnull(max(avg_star),0) star FROM read_book r left join (select isbn, truncate(avg(star),1) avg_star from library group by isbn) l on r.isbn=l.isbn WHERE r.isbn=#{isbn}
select count(*) from library where user_id=#{user_id} and isbn=#{isbn}
